cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)

add_subdirectory(dlib)
add_subdirectory(eigen)
add_subdirectory(mlpack)
add_subdirectory(plotcpp)
add_subdirectory(pytorch)
add_subdirectory(shark)
add_subdirectory(shogun)
add_subdirectory(xtensor)
add_subdirectory(xtensor-blas)
add_subdirectory(xtl)
add_subdirectory(armadillo-code)
add_subdirectory(fast-cpp-csv-parser)
add_subdirectory(opencv)
